about_the_game:
GIVEAWAYS!!!

Our recent giveaway just ended on January 20th! We’ll be doing more of these, so stay tuned. We’ll also be doing Discord-exclusive giveaways, so make sure you join our community server. (link can be found in the list of links on this steam page)

A Planet in Peril - Embrace the darkness, save Erf!

Step into the paws of Shoo, a mysterious, mythical creature with a hidden dual nature, in this charming casual adventure game built in Unreal Engine 5. Summoned by Grandma Nature herself, you're tasked with a crucial mission: rid planet Erf of the ignorant Hoomanz invaders! But beware - not everything on Erf is as it seems...

Light vs. Dark

Switch between two forms of Shoo as you navigate a vibrant, bioluminescent jungle.

Light Shoo: Cute and fluffy, but vulnerable in light.

Dark Shoo: Menacing and powerful, transformed by shadow.

Use your wits to stay hidden, harness the power darkness grants you, and outsmart the Hoomanz at every opportunity!

Key Features

  • Swift Movement: Quick and agile gameplay perfect for snappy, sneaky manoeuvring

  • Laugh Out Loud: Encounter hilarious situations as you outwit the dim-witted Hoomanz

  • Light Stealth Mechanics: Use the darkness wisely or the Hoomanz might see you...

  • Creative Problem Solving: With lots of tools at your disposal, experiment with different strategies to scare away Hoomanz and overcome challenges your own way

Perfect for Casual Gamers

  • Pick-up-and-play style

  • Accessible for all skill levels

  • No punishing checkpoints or game-overs

name: Hoomanz!
short_description: A Planet in Peril - Embrace the darkness, save Erf! Step into the paws of Shoo, a mysterious, mythical creature with a hidden dual nature, in this charming casual adventure game. You're tasked with a mission: rid planet Erf of the ignorant Hoomanz invaders!
